revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Corega |model=CG-WLR300NM |revision=Rev.A1 |upc= |ean=4519157020190 |asin= |price= |est_release_date=2009-11-13 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=Japan only |type=wireless router, |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7240 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3205DM2I-12G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=PSC |ram1_model=A3S56D40ETP-G5 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9283 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=3 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Microsemi;LX5511;MSC, 5511, 9498;2; |default_ssid=002687XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^002687[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=root |default_pass= |oui=00:26:87 |oui_eth=00:26:87 }} [http://corega.jp/prod/wlr300nm/ Product page]
"48RNRA10.0GA" and "2009/09/08" is silkscreened on the board in the images provided by [[User:Mns|Mns]] below. The SSed date code (presumably) on the PCB is '''1003''' (2010, week 3 / Jan 2010 [??]). :The 802.11bgn radio (AR9283) is using two [http://www.microsemi.com/existing-parts/parts/81730 '''Microsemi''' LX5511 (LX5511LQ) InGaP HBT 2.3-2.5GHz Power Amplifier ICs] (they appear to be marked "MSC", "5511, "9498"..). <small>([http://www.microsemi.com/document-portal/doc_download/9195-lx5511-pdf LX5511 datasheet])</small>
==Vendor links== [http://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B002WEE2JC/ On '''Amazon.co.jp'''] :ASIN: B002WEE2JC, Date added: 2009-11-13, Shipping weight: 640g
==Images== ===from [[User:Mns|Mns]]=== <gallery> File:Corega CG-WLR300NM board top 1.jpeg|board top 1 File:Corega CG-WLR300NM board top 2.jpeg|board top 2 </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
